basic.description:
Introduction to ordinary differential equations and their applications to the physical and social sciences. Topics may include: numerical solutions, power series and series solutions, Laplace transforms.
NOTE    Some knowledge of linear algebra is assumed.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: MATH
basic.title: Differential Equations

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     MATH120 or MATH121 or MATH122 or MATH124 or MATH126.
Exclusion    No more than 1 course from MATH225; MATH226; MATH231; MATH232; MATH235; MATH237.
